title: Embroidered Picture, 1948
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: stem, long and short, satin and couching stitches on warp-faced plain weave
inscribed: on paper label pasted to back in Marian Hague's handwriting, "Worked by a patient of th Metropolitan Hospital in the Occupational Therapy Department 'Social Service' 1948".
description: Waterfront scene of New York showing small ship and store fronts in foreground with skyscrapers behind them.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 1948.
1948. Medium: cotton
Technique: stem, long and short, satin and couching stitches on warp-faced plain weave. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-190.
